channel.title: defence on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in defence on funPlantGenes

item.title: BrWAK1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Bra016428 Gene Symbol: BrWAK1 Gene Name: Genome: B.

item.title: CaAGL8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaAGL8 Gene Name: Agamous-like MADS-box protein AGL8-like protein Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: MADS-box protein AGL8 interacts with chromatin-remodelling component SWC4 to activate thermotolerance and environment-dependent immunity in pepper.

item.title: CaARF9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana00g000236 Gene Symbol: CaARF9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Demonstrate that an auxin response factor, CaARF9, has dual roles in enhancing the immune resistance to Ralstonia solanacearum infection and in retarding plant growth by repressing the expression of its target genes as exemplified by Casmc4, CaLBD37, CaAPK1b and CaRROP1.

item.title: CaATL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaATL1 Gene Name: AT-hook-Like gene 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: The chili pepper CaATL1: an AT-hook motif-containing transcription factor implicated in defence responses against pathogens.

item.title: CaC3H14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaC3H14 Gene Name: zinc finger CCCH domain-containing protein 14 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaC3H14 encoding a tandem CCCH zinc finger protein is directly targeted by CaWRKY40 and positively regulates the response of pepper to inoculation by Ralstonia solanacearum.

item.title: CaCAF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaCAF1 Gene Name: CCR4-associated factor Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Capsicum annuum CCR4-associated factor CaCAF1 is necessary for plant development and defence response.

item.title: CaHAT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA01g05840 Gene Symbol: CaHAT1 Gene Name: homeobox ABA signalling related- transcription factor 1 Genome: Solanaceae Genomics Network (http://solgenomics.

item.title: CaLOX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana03g000103 Gene Symbol: CaLOX2 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 2 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: Involvement of sweet pepper CaLOX2 in jasmonate-dependent induced defence against Western flower thrips.

item.title: CaMLO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000221 Gene Symbol: CaMLO1 Gene Name: mildew resistance locus O 1 Genome: Genome assembly Pepper Zunla 1 Ref_v1.

item.title: CaPIF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaPIF1 Gene Name: Pathogen-Induced Factor 1 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: A plant EPF-type zinc-finger protein, CaPIF1, involved in defence against pathogens.

item.title: CaPUB21
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Capana08g000105 Gene Symbol: CaPUB21 Gene Name: U-box domain-containing protein 21 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaPUB21 acted positively in immunity at 28 °C but negatively at 37 °C.

item.title: CaSnRK2.6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CA08g17680 Gene Symbol: CaSnRK2.6 Gene Name: SNF1-related kinase 2.

item.title: CaSWC4
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaSWC4 Gene Name: SWR1-complex protein 4 Genome: Species: Capsicum annuum Functional Descriptions: CaSWC4 regulates the immunity-thermotolerance tradeoff by recruiting CabZIP63/CaWRKY40 to target genes and activating chromatin in pepper.

item.title: ClAGO1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C04G079510 Gene Symbol: ClAGO1 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClAGO1 and ClAGO5 expression levels were highly induced by CGMMV infection.

item.title: ClAGO5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cla97C01G012980 Gene Symbol: ClAGO5 Gene Name: Genome: Citrullus lanatus (Watermelon (97103) v2) Species: Citrullus lanatus Functional Descriptions: ClAGO1 and ClAGO5 expression levels were highly induced by CGMMV infection.

item.title: CsChi23
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa6G507520 Gene Symbol: CsChi23 Gene Name: Chitin-binding type-1 domain-containing protein Genome: Chinese Long Genome v.

item.title: CsExo70B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_1G036490.1 Gene Symbol: CsExo70B Gene Name: exocytosis subunit Exo70B Genome: Cucumber (Chinese Long) v3 Genome Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: Our work reveals a regulatory mechanism that CsExo70B promotes both fruit elongation and disease resistance by maintaining appropriate RK levels at the PM.

item.title: FaGT6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT6 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase6 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Two glucosyltransferases, FaGT6 and FaGT7, were cloned from a strawberry (Fragaria×ananassa) cDNA library and the full-length open reading frames were amplified by rapid amplification of cDNA ends.

item.title: FaGT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT7 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase7 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Two glucosyltransferases, FaGT6 and FaGT7, were cloned from a strawberry (Fragaria×ananassa) cDNA library and the full-length open reading frames were amplified by rapid amplification of cDNA ends.

item.title: FaPE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaPE1 Gene Name: pectinesterase1 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: Concerning hormone regulation, auxin treatment increased FaPE1 mRNA levels in green fruit, whereas exogenous ethylene decreased FaPE1 mRNA levels in ripe and senescing fruits.

item.title: GbCML45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gbar_D04G005070 Gene Symbol: GbCML45 Gene Name: calmodulin-like 45 Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: Positive roles of the Ca2+ sensors GbCML45 and GbCML50 in improving cotton Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GbCYP86A1-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GB_A07G1113 Gene Symbol: GbCYP86A1-1 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhADF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_A09G0773 Gene Symbol: GhADF6 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GhADF6-mediated actin reorganization is associated with defence against Verticillium dahliae infection in cotton.

item.title: GhADF6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: GH_D09G0714 Gene Symbol: GhADF6 Gene Name: actin depolymerizing factor 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: GhADF6-mediated actin reorganization is associated with defence against Verticillium dahliae infection in cotton.

item.title: GhBIN2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhBIN2 Gene Name: Genome: reference genome sequence for G.

item.title: GhJAZ2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D06G0810 Gene Symbol: GhJAZ2 Gene Name: jasmonate2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhJAZ2 attenuates cotton resistance to biotic stresses via the inhibition of the transcriptional activity of GhbHLH171.

item.title: GhMKK5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMKK5 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase kinase5 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhMKK5 affects disease resistance, induces HR-like cell death, and reduces the tolerance to salt and drought stress in transgenic Nicotiana benthamiana.

item.title: GhMPK20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhMPK20 Gene Name: mitogen-activated protein kinase 20 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The cotton MAPK kinase GhMPK20 negatively regulates resistance to Fusarium oxysporum by mediating the MKK4–MPK20–WRKY40 cascade.

item.title: GhPAO
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhPAO Gene Name: polyamine oxidase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton polyamine oxidase (GhPAO) is required for spermine and camalexin signalling in the defence response to Verticillium dahliae.

item.title: GhSSI2-A
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-A Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-B Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhSSI2-C
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSSI2-C Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Cotton GhSSI2 isoforms from the stearoyl acyl carrier protein fatty acid desaturase family regulate Verticillium wilt resistance.

item.title: GhTPS12
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhTPS12 Gene Name: GhLin1 linalool synthase Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The terpene synthase gene family in Gossypium hirsutum harbors a linalool synthase GhTPS12 implicated in direct defence responses against herbivores.

item.title: GhWRKY41
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_A08G2417 Gene Symbol: GhWRKY41 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GmBTB
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmBTB Gene Name: BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmBTB/GmPOZ, a novel BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein, positively regulates the response of soybean to Phytophthora sojae infection.

item.title: GmDR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10g094800 Gene Symbol: GmDR1 Gene Name: Glycine max disease resistance 1 Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Transient expression of the green fluorescent protein fused GmDR1 protein in soybean leaves showed that it is a plasma membrane protein.

item.title: GmPOZ
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GmPOZ Gene Name: BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmBTB/GmPOZ, a novel BTB/POZ domain-containing nuclear protein, positively regulates the response of soybean to Phytophthora sojae infection.

item.title: GmSAMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.02g054200 Gene Symbol: GmSAMT1 Gene Name: salicylic acid methyl transferase 1 Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: A SAMT gene from soybean (GmSAMT1) plays a role in soybean defence against soybean cyst nematode (Heterodera glycines Ichinohe, SCN).

item.title: HvBI-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvBI-1 Gene Name: BAX Inhibitor-1 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Transient over-expression of barley BAX Inhibitor-1 weakens oxidative defence and MLA12-mediated resistance to Blumeria graminis f.

item.title: HvCslD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: HvCslD2 Gene Name: cellulose synthase-like D2 Genome: Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: The barley (Hordeum vulgare) cellulose synthase-like D2 gene (HvCslD2) mediates penetration resistance to host-adapted and nonhost isolates of the powdery mildew fungus.

item.title: HvMORC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU7Hr1G083280.15 Gene Symbol: HvMORC1 Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: We demonstrate that HvMORC1 and HvMORC6a form distinct nucleocytoplasmic homo-/heteromers with other HvMORCs and interact with components of the RNA-directed DNA methylation (RdDM) pathway, further substantiating that MORC proteins are involved in the regulation of TEs in barley.

item.title: HvMORC6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU3Hr1G046280.3 Gene Symbol: HvMORC6a Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: We demonstrate that HvMORC1 and HvMORC6a form distinct nucleocytoplasmic homo-/heteromers with other HvMORCs and interact with components of the RNA-directed DNA methylation (RdDM) pathway, further substantiating that MORC proteins are involved in the regulation of TEs in barley.

item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g18850 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0300400 Gene Symbol: JIOsPR10 OsPR10 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: LrNAC35
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0012070 Gene Symbol: LrNAC35 Gene Name: NAC domain-containing protein 35-like Genome: Species: Lilium regale Functional Descriptions: Ectopic overexpression of LrNAC35 alters flowering time in petunia.

item.title: MdD1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD00G040950 Gene Symbol: MdD1 Gene Name: gamma-thionin protein Genome: Species: Malus domestica Functional Descriptions: A gamma-thionin protein from apple, MdD1, is required for defence against S-RNase-induced inhibition of pollen tube prior to self/non-self recognition.

item.title: MdNB-ARC
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: MD09G1272500 Gene Symbol: MdNB-ARC Gene Name: Genome: Malus x domestica Whole Genome v1.

item.title: MeHB16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeHB16 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine-zipper I (HD-Zip I) TF Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeKIN10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeKIN10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeNR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.S077300.1 Gene Symbol: MeNR1 Gene Name: Nitrate reductase 1 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Investigated the role of MeCatalase1 and MeRAV5-MeNR1/2 module in cassava defence response.

item.title: MeNR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.S076800.1 Gene Symbol: MeNR2 Gene Name: Nitrate reductase 2 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Investigated the role of MeCatalase1 and MeRAV5-MeNR1/2 module in cassava defence response.

item.title: NaPME1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NaPME1 Gene Name: putative pectin methylesterase Genome: Species: Nicotiana attenuata Functional Descriptions: Pectin methylesterase NaPME1 contributes to the emission of methanol during insect herbivory and to the elicitation of defence responses in Nicotiana attenuata.

item.title: NbCdc27B
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NbCdc27B Gene Name: cell division cycle 27 Genome: Species: Nicotiana benthamiana Functional Descriptions: Suppression of Cdc27B expression induces plant defence responses.

item.title: NtCdc27B1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCdc27B1 Gene Name: cell division cycle 27 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of Cdc27B expression induces plant defence responses.

item.title: NtCdc27B2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtCdc27B2 Gene Name: cell division cycle 27 Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Suppression of Cdc27B expression induces plant defence responses.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PhBPBT Gene Name: benzoyl CoA:benzyl alcohol/phenylethanol benzoyltransferase Genome: Species: Petunia hybrida Functional Descriptions: Tissue-specific PhBPBT expression is differentially regulated in response to endogenous ethylene.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpTGA1 Gene Name: Genome: peach reference genome v2.

item.title: PsTrxo1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PsTrxo1 Gene Name: mitochondrial thioredoxin1 Genome: Species: Pisum sativum Functional Descriptions: Response of mitochondrial thioredoxin PsTrxo1, antioxidant enzymes, and respiration to salinity in pea leaves.

item.title: PtaRHE1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PtaRHE1 Gene Name: RING-H2 subgroup RHE protein1 Genome: Species: Populus alba x Populus tremula Functional Descriptions: Ectopic expression of PtaRHE1, encoding a poplar RING-H2 protein with E3 ligase activity, alters plant development and induces defence-related responses.

item.title: SlNRC4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc04g007070 Gene Symbol: SlNRC4a Gene Name: nucleotide-binding leucine-rich repeat receptor 4 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: The intracellular nucleotide-binding leucine-rich repeat receptor (SlNRC4a) enhances immune signalling elicited by extracellular perception.

item.title: SlSAMT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlSAMT|SAMT Gene Name: salicylic acid methyltransferase Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of SlSAMT|SAMT led to a major reduction in SlSAMT|SAMT expression and MeSA emission upon herbivory by spider mites, without affecting the induced emission of other volatiles (terpenoids).

item.title: SlSAP3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SlSAP3 Gene Name: stress-associated protein 3 Genome: Species: Solanum lycopersicum Functional Descriptions: Tomato SlSAP3, a member of the stress-associated protein family, is a positive regulator of immunity against Pseudomonas syringae pv.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: StLTP10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: Silencing of StLTP10 results in reduced resistance to P.

item.title: StUBA2a/b
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Soltu.DM.01G005860.9 Gene Symbol: StUBA2a/b Gene Name: Genome: Species: Solanum tuberosum Functional Descriptions: StMPK7 phosphorylates and stabilizes a potato RNA-binding protein StUBA2a/b to enhance plant defence responses.

item.title: TaABCC3.1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaABCC3.1 Gene Name: ABC transporter C family member 3 protein 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Two variants of an ATP-binding cassette (ABC) family C transporter gene were cloned from DON-treated wheat mRNA, namely TaABCC3.

item.title: TaAGC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaAGC1 Gene Name: AGC kinase 1 Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat AGC kinase TaAGC1 is a positive contributor to host resistance to the necrotrophic pathogen Rhizoctonia cerealis.

item.title: TaCPK7-D
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaCPK7-D Gene Name: cultivar CI 12633 calcium-dependent protein kinase7-D Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: The wheat calcium-dependent protein kinase TaCPK7-D positively regulates host resistance to sharp eyespot disease.
